name: The little bird who wanted to become big
name_original: The little bird who wanted to become big
description:
Once upon a time there was one little bird.
The bird was very brave, but very, very small.
He couldn't fly as high as other birds. He couldn't fly as far as other birds. Other birds made fun of him and bully him all the time.
Then the bird decided to become big like other birds.

============================================

It's the nine game in my 2021:GameAMonth project.
The theme for the month was "MOVEMENT".

============================================

Visual style heavily inspired by TRÜF.
Background music and sounds by VOiD1 Gaming.
